alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 07 at 5:06AM PST until December 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the High Wind Warning, northwest to north winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Interstate 5 Corridor. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 3 PM PST this afternoon. For the High Wind Warning, from 3 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain indoors and avoid windows. Use extra caution if you must drive.
